name: So Bad It's Good with Ryan Bailey

episodes.title: Real Housewives of Salt Lake City Ep 9 Recap-Mystery in the Sky + The Cult of Mary Cosby
episodes.description: FULL RHOSLC Episode 9 Recap!!! Plus, before that I talk about the new TLC docuseries coming out about Mary Cosby! Dark stuff! Also, come to our meet up this saturday if you can! ⁠ SIGN UP HER⁠ E .
